Content: for me it was easy. but depends what operating system and how familiar you are with cli and what not.

Author: stephenleeholmes118#1884

Author: Nagol#1866
Content: if you run linux I can help walk you through it but if your on windows I wont be much help.

Author: stephenleeholmes118#1884
Content: 😂 I'm stuck then

Author: Nagol#1866
Content: well if you have some time to put towards it I am sure you can figure it out. All you got to do is clone the dev repo of komodo. Then install build time dependencies. then compile. then run.

Author: Nagol#1866
Content: they got good instructions on the git hub. hang on a sec

Author: Nagol#1866
Content: ok just checked the git hub windows instructions and you got to crosscompile with mingw so not so simple as I thought for windows users.

Author: Nagol#1866
Content: if you have ever ran a virtual machine like virtualbox or someithing id be glad to help you if you want. just get a vm going with ubuntu 16.04 or 18.04. And you will be close. If you dont feel like messing with it no prob. Agama shouldnt be much longer.

Author: stephenleeholmes118#1884
Content: Do I download the windows host on virtualbox

Author: Nagol#1866
Content: yeah

Author: Nagol#1866
Content: install virtualbox create your first guest wich will be ubuntu. then once you get ubuntu going you just follow the instructions here: https://github.com/jl777/komodo

Author: Nagol#1866
Content: just replace --branch master with --branch dev

Author: Nagol#1866
Content: If you get stuck anywhere holler

Author: Nagol#1866
Content: if there is a command or instruction you dont understand hit me up.

Author: stephenleeholmes118#1884
Content: Do I go on the read me part of the github and follow all that code

Author: Nagol#1866
Content: na just the main page I linked.

Author: Nagol#1866
Content: just scroll down they got the instructions for the different operating systems. you will follow the linux ones

Author: Nagol#1866
Content: it starts with About this Project

Author: Nagol#1866
Content: Getting started

Author: Nagol#1866
Content: as soon as you get your ubuntu virtul machine going ill take you through it one step at a time and show you whats up.

Content: It uses the same address scheme as komodo

Content:
👆🏽 that
and "the wallet" is komodod (just like every other assetchain)

Author: KSanJuan#9608
Content: So the mining proceeds from the ZEX can just be deposited right into my Agama KMd address and that alone will generate/activate the ZEX coin.  Stupid simple then.

Author: ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢#7004
Content: nothing "activates" an address, it's either valid or it's not and you either have a key for it or you don't

Author: polycryptoblog#1173
Content: @KSanJuan  when you can access it in Agama you will just use the same passphrase/key .  If you want earlier access you need to run it via commandline
